items.badge_description: You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 100 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 21.

items.checkin_comment: Good, subtle fruit flavor. Will have to try some of the others in the series

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 55 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 12!
Travel much? You must be a "brewsetter". That's at least 5 beers from 5 different countries.

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 50 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 11!

items.checkin_comment: Still the same as before, don't like it any more or less the second time.

Nice job exploring the world of beer. You've sampled over 100 different brews!

beer.beer_name: Raven Special Lager 20th Anniversary Premium Edition

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 55 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 12!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 50 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 11!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 15 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 4!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 95 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 20.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 12)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 13!

#JanuQuenchy is back! We want to shed some holiday pounds but we don’t want to give up drinking really good beer. Enter SeaQuench Ale, the award-winning low-calorie beer that happens to be the most thirst-quenching beer Dogfish has ever brewed. This month join founder Sam Calagione and the Dogfish crew as we resolve to eat sensibly, do something active, and commit to SeaQuench Ale being the only beer we drink all month. Check out our blog for some encouragement from Sam!
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 35 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 8!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 50 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 11!

The beer you're currently enjoying will do more than just satisfy your taste buds; it will help Californians recover from the worst wild fires in the state's history. Brewed by more than 1400 breweries around the country, all proceeds from these beers benefit Sierra Nevada's Camp Fire Relief Fund. You can learn more and make donations here.
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 10 check-ins with a photo.

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 60 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 13!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 90 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 19.

Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 5 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more to unlock Level 2.

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 85 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 18.
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink a new beer on three Thursdays in a 30 day period! Find out how New Brew Thursday was started, and catch up on old episodes.

items.checkin_comment: Tasty, I can see why it won the 2018 MD comptroller's cup
